Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-4565 affecting package protobuf for versions less than 3.17.3-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-4565 affecting package protobuf for versions less than 3.17.3-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package protobuf is earlier than 3.17.3-4, affected by CVE-2025-4565
